description.narrative:
Some of the development impacts are highlighted below:
Improving IT infrastructure in Ukraine: Currently, there are no certified Tier III datacenters in Ukraine or data centers that fully meet the requirements of the National Bank of Ukraine. DeNovo would provide a service level that fully meets the requirements of financial institutions and auditors. Increase in capacity: Though there are more than a dozen data center services providers in Ukraine, the IT services market in Ukraine is underdeveloped and demonstrates a strong capacity on the demand side. Reduced climate change impact: DeNovo data center will be established using a "green" computing concept, i.e. implementation of energy-efficient computers, network servers and peripherals, as well as "free air cooling" technologies. The data center will install state-of-the-art special software based power management systems to optimize power usage. The power saving potential is up to 30%. Banking sector development: DeNovo will provide the local banking sector with access to high quality computing capacity with guaranteed up-time, power outage protection, operational data security, and communications redundancy. Outsourcing of data center services would allow Ukrainian customers to reduce Capex and operational costs, to free up cash to invest in the core business. Employment generation: Up to 30 new high-income jobs will be created due to the project implementation. Skills Training: DeNovo specialists will be able to get first-hand experience in operating Tier III datacenter which is now unavailable in the local IT market.

The project involves a $3.5 million investment in De Novo Corporation (De Novo, or the company) to support the companys plan to establish a Tier III data center in Kiev, Ukraine. The data center is being designed to maximize energy efficiency, and would likely be the most green data center in Ukraine. Through the investment, the company will provide datacenter and business continuity services required by medium-sized and large clients in a number of industries.
